/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China, viewed from a street-level perspective. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The roads are filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
